entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
